title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Experiential Learning for Low-Cost Housing Social Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social issues and professional fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more social innovation strategies for solving affordable housing challenges.
Learners can design and simulate community collaboration processes using mobile platforms.
Learners can submit at least one innovative housing design idea applicable in resource-constrained environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
